title: Gauley River National Recreation Area: Safety
body: Safety          We hope that your trip to Gauley River National Recreation Area will be a fun and memorable experience.    Taking time to plan and prepare for your visit will better ensure that it is a safe and enjoyable time. Look over the following items to better understand some of the possible hazards and safety issues you may encounter.      Â    Water Safety  Heat Related Illness  Hypothermia  Lightning  Poison Ivy  Spiders and Insects  Snakes
